builder in just 3 easy steps:

Total Design Freedom, DIY!

With Silex, you can create any custom design, pixel perfect.

Hacking Without Limits

Are you looking for :

100 % free website builder Faster than wordpress website A free Elementor alternative

You are in the right place !

Get Started!

﻿

The freedom to create anything

Free minds need free tools to make the world a better place

Whether you’re a maker about to create a website for the first time or you’re a pro designer or coder making websites for customers, you will love Silex. You have two ways to start: open Silex and start with one of the a free website provided with Silex, or follow a tutorial before you play with the tool.

You can always add advanced functionality to your website with code - HTML, CSS, Javascript. It’s time to get your professional website.

Get Started!

﻿

Powerful features for your website

What Makes Our Website Builder
the Best Choice for You?

﻿

Silex for professionals

Freelancers, agencies, hosting companies, Silex is the best at being customized, white labeled and integrated to your infrastructure

﻿

Get Started!

﻿

Still not convinced? Try our free website builder yourself.

Every day, hundreds of people worldwide use Silex to create websites and own their online presence.

﻿

Get Started!

﻿

Silex for teams

This is a whole new philosophy we have invented here.

We work in teams with Silex since 2006 like this: the developer provides the designer with components which take advantage of all the design features of the drag and drop editor. As a developer you have the tools to hack Silex in no time and add custom client side or server side components, which will then be available to the designer who knows how s.he wants the site to look like and how it is supposed to react to the user interactions. The designer can add a custom component to a site and style it and change its behaviour as needed

Get Started!

HOSTING COMPANIES

Lorem ipsum

Silex is a great solution for companies who wish to offer a website builder to their customers. Either for retention purposes or as an additional service, Silex can integrate your infrastructure and your services. Join us as we are working on a road map to make Silex even better at white labeling, authentication with third party systems, storage on an existing infrastructure…

﻿

Get Started!

﻿

PAID SERVICES

Lorem ipsum dolor

Silex founder, Alex Hoyau is selling services to support businesses to use Silex as a replacement for their CMS or website builder. When the community support is not enough, contact him by email: b2b AT silex.me

Whether youre a maker about to create a website for the first time or youre a pro designer or coder making websites for customers, you will love Silex.

more about freedom

Start Silex online

Connect an existing account

Use the instance provided Silex Labs for free, no installation, store your data in your Dropbox, Owncloud, GitHub or FTP, get started immediately!

﻿

Start now!

﻿

Documentation

﻿

Download Silex Desktop App

You are in orbit !

Use the desktop version of Silex to work offline, store your data on your computer - currently MacOS and Linux only.

Downloads

﻿

Deploy to your Server

And conquer the galaxy!

Use the 1 click install, the docker image or just any server to create an instance of Silex under your own name, for your users or just for hacking

﻿

Start now!

﻿

Documentation

﻿

Use Silex in your project

Hack Silex, get it from npm

Use npm to install Silex on you local computer or include it in a project, then run it with specific parameters or even replace some parts of it

﻿

Downloads

FREE, FREE HOW ?

This is a whole new philosophy we have invented here.

As a non-profit, we’re free to innovate without any pressure to compromise. Silex is free / libre, without hidden costs or licensing hassle. You are welcome to contribute and to offer services to the community.

Let Silex publish your site and host it anywhere.
